import React,{useState} from 'react'; import Base from "../core/Base"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { signup } from '../auth/helper'; import "../styles.css"; const Signup=()=> { const [values,setValues]=useState({ name:"", email:"", password:"", error:"", success:false, }); const {name,email,password,error,success}= values; const handleChange = (name) => (event) => { setValues({...values,error:false,[name]:event.target.value}); }; return (
